meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family, typically having showy flowers and lobed leaves.
meanings.sent1: The hellebores in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some hellebores near the fence.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns among the hellebores.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a field of hellebores, bright and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The hellebores swayed gently in the breeze, a colorful dance in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Helleborus, native to Eurasia, with poisonous roots and leaves.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to touch the hellebores in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The ancient herbalist knew the dangers of hellebores.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat pretended to nibble on the hellebores, teasing the birds.
meanings.sent4: The darkness in her eyes was like the poison of hellebores, hidden yet potent.
meanings.sent5: The hellebores whispered warnings to those who dared to tread near their roots.
